25.eng-name: The Office of the Judge (Kitab Al-Aqdiyah)

hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by sa’id b. ‘Urubah through the chain as narrated by Ibn Minhal. This version has :About an animal and they had no proof. So the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) ordered to cast lots about the oath

chapter.ara-name: باب الرَّجُلَيْنِ يَدَّعِيَانِ شَيْئًا وَلَيْسَتْ لَهُمَا بَيِّنَةٌ
chapter.eng-name: Two men who claim something but have no proof
